    • Method Detail

      • delete

        @PreAuthorize(value="#ad.user.login == authentication.name or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
public void delete(Ad ad)
        Method for deleting the ad. User can delete only its ads, or any ads if user has role ROLE_ADMIN
        Parameters:
        Ad - ad
